Articles.Content:
I have a large station/ship.

Under acceleration it twitches, its not a wobble in the structure.

Its like the camera or ship is twitching between two or so positions leading to a very annoying twitchy view.

This is part of a semi challenge where a forum member asked me to send the thing to Jool. ( Using ion engines).

Could be floating point glitching. Lots of those in this game and what you describe fits the symptoms pretty well. Not much you can do about it, if that's what it is.

My only advice is to use time acceleration while having a different ship/probe/flag focused. That will put the whole thing basically out of the game except as a point on the map - at the very least you won't have to look at it. Just be careful not to miss your windows.

=Smidge=
Thinking of a total redesign to reduce part count, I suspect it may be control point isn't inline with direction of thrust?
